channel.title: black box on Data Trigger
channel.description: Recent content in black box on Data Trigger

item.title: Interpretable machine learning with SHAP
item.author: contact@datatrigger.org (Vincent Le Goualher)
item.description: In this post, we predict health insurance costs with an efficient black box model, namely random forest. Then we interpret individual predictions as well as the global behavior of the estimator using SHapley Additive exPlanations.
